main event: A mysterious object was reported to have fallen into Sardis Lake, Mississippi, and was later identified as a Signal Corps radio-controlled model.
interesting points: The object was initially reported by a fisherman who saw it fall into the lake., Engineers conducted an investigation and recovered the object three months later., The object was described as having about 10 plastic tubes attached by wires., It was confirmed by Greenville Air Force base as a lost transmitter from a training plane., The Air Force was not conducting tests in the area at the time of the fall.
witness description: A fisherman who reported the falling object.
